author: gartung
body:
gcc 6.0 misleading-indent warning flagged these. I think the author intended
to fill the historgram with the value just set. I added the curly braces
to do that. Without them the last value of fullType set would be added to
all of the histograms.
title: DQM/SiPixelMonitorRawData fix for bug flagged by gcc 6.0 missleading-indent warning
